description: A narrow path surrounded by dense bushes. You hear rustling sounds nearby.

enemies.name: Goblin Warrior
enemies.description: A sneaky goblin with a rusted sword.

enemies.name: Goblin Shaman
enemies.description: A goblin casting spells from the shadows.

traps.trapDescription: A concealed pit covered with leaves.
A hidden snare trap, ready to catch the unwary.

escapeRoute: A narrow gap between two rocks leading back to the safety of the forest.

description: An eerie, damp crypt filled with the stench of decay. The walls are lined with old, crumbling coffins.

enemies.name: Skeleton Warrior
enemies.description: A reanimated skeleton with a chipped sword and shield.

enemies.name: Ghost
enemies.description: A spectral entity that floats through the air, emitting a chilling wail.

description: A dimly lit cave with scattered supplies and a makeshift campfire in the center.

enemies.name: Bandit Leader
enemies.description: A grizzled bandit with a wicked grin and a sharp axe.

enemies.name: Bandit Archer
enemies.description: A bandit with a bow, ready to strike from the shadows.

traps.trapDescription: A hidden tripwire connected to a crossbow trap.

escapeRoute: A hidden tunnel behind a pile of crates that seems to lead outside.

description: A large, circular arena surrounded by tall stone walls. The ground is stained with old blood.

enemies.name: Minotaur
enemies.description: A fearsome beast with the body of a man and the head of a bull, wielding a massive battle axe.

traps.trapDescription: A pit filled with spikes that opens unexpectedly in the middle of the arena.
